summary: Tested UI/UX improvements for My Dammaiguda mobile-first civic engagement platform. All 5 features verified on mobile viewport (375x812). Found and fixed critical bug in Layout.jsx where dark mode toggle code was left behind causing menu to crash.

fixed_bugs.issue: Menu crashed with 'toggleTheme is not defined' error - dark mode toggle code was left behind after dark mode removal
fixed_bugs.fix: Removed orphaned dark mode toggle section (lines 200-222) that referenced undefined toggleTheme, isDark, Moon, Sun

passed_tests: TEST 1: Black Header - bg-gray-900 on Dashboard header (computed: rgb(17, 24, 39))
TEST 1: Black Header - bg-gray-900 on Landing Page header confirmed
TEST 2: AQI Badge no-wrap - whitespace-nowrap class present on status badge
TEST 2: AQI Badge - min-w-[60px] on parent container preventing text wrap
TEST 2: AQI Badge - Computed whitespace: nowrap (verified 'Very Unhealthy' not wrapping)
TEST 3: Quick Actions Grid - Found 3 grids with 3x3 layout
TEST 3: Quick Actions - All items have h-20 height class
TEST 3: Quick Actions - All items have rounded-2xl corners
TEST 3: Quick Actions - All items have border styling
TEST 3: Quick Actions - Icon containers (h-10 w-10) present and centered
TEST 4: Card Borders - Wall Widget has rounded-2xl and border-gray-200
TEST 4: Card Borders - AQI Cards have rounded-2xl and proper borders
TEST 5: Mobile Layout - No horizontal overflow (scrollWidth=375, viewport=375)
Menu functionality - Fixed and verified working with 22 menu items
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Layout.jsx had orphaned dark mode toggle code (lines 200-222) referencing undefined toggleTheme, isDark, Moon, Sun variables causing runtime error when menu opened
Dashboard.jsx AQI badge implementation is correct: uses whitespace-nowrap and min-w-[60px] on lines 492-496
Quick Actions correctly use h-20 rounded-2xl with icon containers (h-10 w-10) with proper centering classes
LandingPage.jsx header correctly uses bg-gray-900 for black header
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI/UX improvements verified working: 1) AQI badge uses whitespace-nowrap and min-w-[60px] - text does not wrap, 2) Dashboard cards use rounded-2xl and border-gray-200/60, 3) Quick Actions are 3x3 grid with h-20 items and centered icons, 4) Black header (bg-gray-900) on all pages, 5) No mobile horizontal overflow. Fixed critical bug where menu was crashing due to orphaned dark mode toggle code.

mocked_apis.otp_authentication: Uses static OTP 123456 (displayed as Dev OTP in UI)

aqi_badge_nowrap.parent_classes: inline-flex px-2.5 py-1.5 rounded-lg items-center justify-center min-w-[60px]

bug_fixed.issue: Menu crashed when opened with 'toggleTheme is not defined' error
bug_fixed.root_cause: Dark mode toggle code (lines 200-222 in Layout.jsx) was left behind after dark mode was removed, referencing undefined variables: toggleTheme, isDark, Moon, Sun
bug_fixed.fix_applied: Removed the entire dark mode toggle section from Layout.jsx
bug_fixed.verification: Menu now opens correctly with 22 menu items visible, no runtime errors
